TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, the young generation is ruined and unable to take care of their children and run the world.

I wish for a working, non-lethal Phaser Mk 2

It has no power source included. The power source you need is not available in this age.

I wish for a plane.

It's a rigged plane that instantly exploded when you got in.

I wish I had an ATI Readon HD 7990 Graphics card

Granted. Once it arrives, you find nothing supports it.

I wish I could get over this cold.

Granted. You now have a 110 degree F fever.

I wish

Granted, but you don't. You remain trapped in an eternal state of wanting to wish, but not being able to.

I wish for plane tickets for a return trip to America.

Granted, but you don't. You remain trapped in an eternal state of wanting to wish, but not being able to.

I wish for plane tickets for a return trip to America.

Granted, as you get off the plain in America you are pulled aside for a 'random' check.

You are seen to enter the security rooms, but not seen to leave. Hours go by, days, weeks, months and years.

Finally late in the 21st century the oppressive American government is overthrown, but sadly it was too late for you having rotted away in a cell to nothing years ago.

I wish my wish was not corrupted as much as Vexx's

I wish my wish was not corrupted as much as Vexx's

Granted, it's corrupted more.

I wish for it to rain baguettes

Granted. You are killed by a baguette made from stone as it drops from the sky.

I wish sjwt would kill his dreams instead of mine. ._.

Granted. He has a dream of you, so he kills you. Then he dreams of your loved ones...

I wish that Eve 6's new songs are as good as their old.

Granted, They're as good as their grandfathers, decayed to ashes.

I wish for MOAR PRESENTS

Granted. You are buried in an immense pile of presents, never to emerge again.

I wish for air.

Granted. No

I wish for nothing at all. Except for this wish, in which will cancel out this wish

Granted, you become Void.

I wish^10.
Granted. But I was looking at my screen upside-down so: V10
I wish Rage would have remembered to make a wish.

I wish Rage would have remembered to make a wish.

Granted, but the wish is for it to be corrupted by someone who isn't Elon Musk.

I wish that Staplers were real.

Granted. No

I wish for potatos

Granted, they're posionous.

I Wish for reaction images.

Granted. I've got tons of them. Problem is I can't really post them here because there are rules against that.

I wish shasacat was more popular.

Granted, but now you have to deal with me whining about mod duties

I wish thoughts would just pop out of my head and onto the computer

Granted. You now have to clean your squashed brain off of your computer

I wish that someone who isn't connected to the internet corrupts this wish

Granted. The shadows in the darkness gather in order to corrupt your soul while you sleep.

I wish for a pineapple.

Granted. It is, in, unmentionable places

I wish for a potato that won't kill me

Granted, but it's on the Moon.

I wish for my computer to stop sounding like a hairdryer.

Granted. How do you like the sound of a train engine?

I wish I owned the tank in my signature.
